summary: Diff updates `categoryBannerImages` in `frontend/src/content/business.ts` to include `salad` and `soup` banner paths and retains `drinks`. However, the diff does not add/update the required static image assets under `frontend/public/assets/generated/`, and it does not provide evidence that the drinks images were actually edited to remove beer imagery. Additional unrelated changes appear in `business.ts` (e.g., menu item image resolution path logic) and unrelated metadata files.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure Drinks categories (“Hot & Cold Bar”, “Fresh Juice Seasonal”) use a drinks banner image with no beer imagery, and update banner mappings in `frontend/src/content/business.ts` accordingly.
missing_requirements.reason: While `categoryBannerImages.drinks` points to `/assets/generated/menu-category-drinks.dim_1600x900.jpg`, the diff provides no evidence that the underlying drinks assets were updated to remove beer imagery, and the truncated `menu` section prevents confirming the specific categories (“Hot & Cold Bar”, “Fresh Juice Seasonal”) are mapped to `drinks` (or have correct `image` fields) without changing names/prices.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update banner mapping so “Lawazmat (Salads)”, “Salad” use a salad banner image and “Soup” uses a soup banner image in `frontend/src/content/business.ts`.
missing_requirements.reason: `categoryBannerImages` includes `salad` and `soup` paths, but the `menu: [...]` structure where category objects and their `image`/mapping would be applied is truncated, so the diff summary does not conclusively show those specific categories are wired to these keys/paths.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add new banner image files for Salad and Soup under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` with exact filenames referenced by `frontend/src/content/business.ts`.
missing_requirements.reason: No files were added in the diff; there is no evidence that `frontend/public/assets/generated/menu-category-salad.dim_1600x900.jpg` and `frontend/public/assets/generated/menu-category-soup.dim_1600x900.jpg` were created.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the existing drinks banner and thumb images so they contain no beer imagery (menu-category-drinks.dim_1600x900.jpg and menu-thumb-drinks-hnd.dim_256x256.jpg) under `frontend/public/assets/generated/`.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no static asset modifications/additions; thus there is no evidence the drinks images were edited/replaced to remove beer imagery.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure all updated category banner references point to files that exist at runtime (no broken images).
missing_requirements.reason: Because the referenced salad/soup banner files are not shown as added, the updated references may be broken at runtime; diff provides no evidence of the files’ existence.

hallucinated_features.description: Changed menu item image path generation to use Ultra HD 4K (`.dim_3840x2160.jpg`) for menu item images.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to fix category banner images for Salad/Soup and remove beer imagery from Drinks visuals; it explicitly constrained changes to category banner image references and not broader menu image behavior.
evidence: frontend/src/content/business.ts (truncated): `getMenuItemImage` returns `/assets/generated/menu-item-${slug}.dim_3840x2160.jpg` and comments about Ultra HD 4K

hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest; only `frontend/src/content/business.ts` image mapping and static assets under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` were in scope.
